segments.text: I see the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, he must really want one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks so unstable, I hope he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, she looks so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know how much trouble they'll be in if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is just pouring onto the floor, and the woman doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's going to be in for a big surprise when she finally looks down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so quiet, he must really want those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make too much noise and wake their mother up from her dish drying trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks like she's about to get her cookie, she seems so excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll share the cookies or if the boy will eat them all himself.
segments.speaker: PAR
